description: Lists the mail domains in a given WorkMail organization.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The WorkMail organization for which to list domains.

nested_items.name: MailDomains
nested_items.description: The list of mail domain summaries, specifying domains that exist in the specified WorkMail organization, along with the information about whether the domain is or isn't the default.

nested_items.name: DefaultDomain
nested_items.description: Whether the domain is default or not.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. The value becomes null when there are no more results to return.
